title: Fate/kaleid liner Prisma☆Illya OVA
alternative_title: Fate/Kaleid Liner Prisma Illya: Dance at the Sports Festival!, Fate/kaleid liner プリズマ☆イリヤ 運動会 DE ダンス！
description: Illyasviel von Einzbern, an ordinary elementary schoolgirl who dreams about anime magical girls—until she encounters Magical Ruby and assumes the duties of a real magical girl.
